defense_tackle_assists.sentence: Unfortunately, Detroit could not contain Peterson, who rushed for 92 yards and a score on just 15 carries.

1.comment: Anthony Henry had turned around, he would have caught an easy pick. A few plays later, Favre lollipopped the ball downfield and nearly tossed another interception. He also took too many sacks early on.    Favre has played the Lions and Browns thus far. Things are going to get a lot uglier when the opposing defense can actually take the run away and Adrian Peterson can't bail him out. Unfortunately, Detroit could not contain Peterson, who rushed for 92 yards and a score on just 15 carries. Of course, 1 has to wonder why Peterson got only 15 carries.    Two games and 2 touchdowns for Henry had turned around, he would have caught an easy pick. A few plays later, Favre lollipopped the ball downfield and nearly tossed another interception.
